audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - Dr. Laird; Dr. Laird/Mr. Sutton; Dr. Crane - 1960 November 27
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: Crane, Henry Hitt
audio_item.dc.rights.access: This material is available for research only in the Reading Room of the Bentley Historical Library at the University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI).

audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Side 1] : Dr. Laird, “Wayne State Communism and Freedom Speech” : Recording of Dr. Laird, Sutton, and Crane sermons: November 27, 1960 Track 1; Dr. Laird, “Wayne State Communism and Freedom Speech”; Dr. Laird/Mr. Sutton “What about Elmer Gantry”; December 4, 1960 Track 2 Dr. Crane, “The Plight of the Pressured.”

[Side 2] : Dr. Laird/Mr. Sutton “What about Elmer Gantry” : Recording of Dr. Laird, Sutton, and Crane sermons: November 27, 1960 Track 1; Dr. Laird, “Wayne State Communism and Freedom Speech”; Dr. Laird / Mr. Sutton “What about Elmer Gantry”; December 4, 1960 Track 2 Dr. Crane, “The Plight of the Pressured.”
